options.label: 101 Essays That Will Change The Way You Think

The Defining Decade: Why Your Twenties Matter--And How to Make the Most of Them Now
The Overview: Meditations on Nature for a World in Transition

fields.name: formActionUrl
fields.label: Google Form Action URL
fields.description: The Google Form submission URL (ending in /formResponse)

fields.name: nameFieldId
fields.label: Name Field ID
fields.description: Google Form entry ID for name field (e.g., entry.123456789)

fields.name: emailFieldId
fields.label: Email Field ID
fields.description: Google Form entry ID for email field (e.g., entry.987654321)

fields.name: successDuration
fields.label: Success Duration (ms)
fields.description: How long to show the success message before resetting the form

fields.name: draft
fields.label: Draft
fields.description: Drafts will be saved but not publicly visible.

fields.name: id
fields.label: YouTube Video ID
fields.description: The video ID from the YouTube URL (e.g., 'dQw4w9WgXcQ')

fields.name: title
fields.label: Video Title
fields.description: Accessible title for the video (defaults to 'YouTube video')

fields.name: start
fields.label: Start Time (seconds)
fields.description: Start the video at a specific time in seconds

fields.name: end
fields.label: End Time (seconds)
fields.description: End the video at a specific time in seconds

fields.name: autoplay
fields.label: Autoplay
fields.description: Auto-play the video when the page loads

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
